text: aap se haiz ke baare mein sawaal karte hai, kehdi jiye ke wo gandagi hai, haalath haiz mein aurto se alag raho, aur jab tak wo paak na ho jaaye un ke qareeb na jao, haan jab wo paak ho jaaye to un ke paas jaao jahaa se Allah ne tumhe ijaazath di hai, Allah tauba karne waalo ko aur paak rehne walo ko pasand farmata hai
